Structural Scanner.Name: Structural Scanner
Structural Scanner.Effect:
Scans all visible walls for signs of hidden doorways, determines whether an explosive machine has been destabilized and how long until detonation, and provides a +2% chance to detect each hidden trap within field of view (the latter is checked each turn on a per-trap basis, and stacks). Also highlights areas that will soon cave in due to instability even without further stimulation.
 <stacks>

Triangulator.Name: Triangulator
Triangulator.Effect: Reasons likely distance at which each visible hostile can spot you, enables predictions of robot travel paths, and analyzes ambient signals to determine how many hostiles are currently tracking you.

Sensor Array.Name: Sensor Array
Sensor Array.Effect: Enables robot scanning up to a distance of 10, once per turn.

Imp. Sensor Array.Name: Imp. Sensor Array
Imp. Sensor Array.Effect: Enables robot scanning up to a distance of 13, once per turn.

Adv. Sensor Array.Name: Adv. Sensor Array
Adv. Sensor Array.Effect: Enables robot scanning up to a distance of 16, once per turn.

Lrn. Sensor Array.Name: Lrn. Sensor Array
Lrn. Sensor Array.Effect: Enables robot scanning up to a distance of 20, once per turn.

Mak. Sensor Array.Name: Mak. Sensor Array
Mak. Sensor Array.Effect: Enables robot scanning up to a distance of 22, once per turn.

Exp. Sensor Array.Name: Exp. Sensor Array
Exp. Sensor Array.Effect: Enables robot scanning up to a distance of 30, once per turn.

Signal Interpreter.Name: Signal Interpreter
Signal Interpreter.Effect: Strength 1: Robot scan signals differentiate between object sizes. (Requires data from a Sensor Array.) Also enables deciphering of signals emitted from adjacent exits, revealing where they lead, and at garrisons know the time until the next response dispatch, if any. When multiple exits lead to the same destination, after having identified the first, subsequent ones will be identified on sight even without an interpreter.

Imp. Signal Interpreter.Name: Imp. Signal Interpreter
Imp. Signal Interpreter.Effect: Strength 2: Robot scan signals accurately reflect target size and class, and are unaffected by system corruption. (Requires data from a Sensor Array.) Also enables deciphering of signals emitted from adjacent exits, revealing where they lead, and at garrisons know the time until the next response dispatch, if any. When multiple exits lead to the same destination, after having identified the first, subsequent ones will be identified on sight even without an interpreter.

Adv. Signal Interpreter.Name: Adv. Signal Interpreter
Adv. Signal Interpreter.Effect: Strength 3: Robot scan signals accurately reflect target size and specific class rating, and are unaffected by system corruption. (Requires data from a Sensor Array.) Also enables deciphering of signals emitted from adjacent exits, revealing where they lead, and at garrisons know the time until the next response dispatch, if any. When multiple exits lead to the same destination, after having identified the first, subsequent ones will be identified on sight even without an interpreter.

Exp. Signal Interpreter.Name: Exp. Signal Interpreter
Exp. Signal Interpreter.Effect: Strength 4: Robot scan signals accurately reflect target size and specific class rating, are unaffected by system corruption, and can discern dormant, unpowered, disabled, and broken robots. (Requires data from a Sensor Array.) Also enables deciphering of signals emitted from adjacent exits, revealing where they lead, and at garrisons know the time until the next response dispatch, if any. When multiple exits lead to the same destination, after having identified the first, subsequent ones will be identified on sight even without an interpreter.

Imp. Terrain Scanner.Effect: Enables terrain scanning up to a distance of 16, once per turn.

Adv. Terrain Scanner.Effect: Enables terrain scanning up to a distance of 20, once per turn.

Removes all corruption and wipes entire memory, including part knowledge, robot analysis, schematics, and map data. Also restores knowledge of alien technology.
 <consumed>

Terrabomb.Name: Terrabomb
Terrabomb.Effect:
Destroys all walls and earth up to a distance of 20 without affecting other materials.
 <consumed>

Matter Drive.Name: Matter Drive
Matter Drive.Effect: Converts each adjacent wall, earth, and door to 100-300 energy.

Stasis Generator.Name: Stasis Generator
Stasis Generator.Effect: Prevents movement by any robot within a range of 3.

LRC Armor.Name: LRC Armor
LRC Armor.Effect:
Permanently increases maximum core integrity by 250.
 <consumed>

LRC Energy Well.Name: LRC Energy Well
LRC Energy Well.Effect:
Permanently increases energy storage capacity by 250.
 <consumed>

LRC Matter Compressor.Name: LRC Matter Compressor
LRC Matter Compressor.Effect:
Permanently increases matter storage capacity by 125.
 <consumed>

LRC Boosters.Name: LRC Boosters
LRC Boosters.Effect:
Permanently increases mass support by 10 (regardless of propulsion).
 <consumed>

LRC Insulator.Name: LRC Insulator
LRC Insulator.Effect:
Permanently sets base electromagnetic damage resistance to 25%, if not already better.
 <consumed>

Immobilizer.Name: Immobilizer
Immobilizer.Effect: Disables one hover or flight propulsion component with each hit. No effect on targets with disruption immunity.

AWS/EX-DEC.Name: AWS/EX-DEC
AWS/EX-DEC.Effect: Selects its own targets and attacks them if in range, at no time cost to you.

Plasma Storm.Name: Plasma Storm
Plasma Storm.Description: Thermal explosion at targets inflict 23-27 damage with a radius of 2 (falloff: 2). Low heat transfer.

AWS/Thermal.Name: AWS/Thermal
AWS/Thermal.Effect: Selects its own targets and attacks them if in range, at no time cost to you.

Latent Energy Streamer.Name: Latent Energy Streamer
Latent Energy Streamer.Effect: Redirects latent energy from up to a range of 12, using no more than necessary to achieve average detonation power limit (100).

Firepult.Name: Firepult
Firepult.Description: Thermal explosion at targets inflict 25-35 damage with a radius of 3 (falloff: 5). Massive heat transfer.

YOLO Cannon.Name: YOLO Cannon
YOLO Cannon.Description: Thermal explosion inflicts 65-85 damage with a radius of 3 (falloff: 10). Massive heat transfer.

Potential Cannon.Name: Potential Cannon
Potential Cannon.Description: Thermal explosion inflicts 75-125 damage with a radius of 3 (falloff: 25). Massive heat transfer.

Imp. Potential Cannon.Name: Imp. Potential Cannon
Imp. Potential Cannon.Description: Thermal explosion inflicts 90-130 damage with a radius of 3 (falloff: 20). Massive heat transfer.

Core Cannon.Name: Core Cannon
Core Cannon.Effect: Core loses 10-30 integrity with each discharge.

AWS/Gauss.Name: AWS/Gauss
AWS/Gauss.Effect: Selects its own targets and attacks them if in range, at no time cost to you.

AWS/Autocannon.Name: AWS/Autocannon
AWS/Autocannon.Effect: Selects its own targets and attacks them if in range, at no time cost to you.

Containment Facilitator.Name: Containment Facilitator
Containment Facilitator.Effect: Holds targets in place. Also cancels a flying/hovering target's 10%/5% bonus to dodge for the duration.

Datajack.Name: Datajack
Datajack.Effect: Penetrates target robot just enough to enable system access for hacking. Also a base 50% chance to rewire temporarily disabled hostiles, further modified by any offensive hackware. Can be used to parse almost any robot system. Many more hacking options available after RIF installation, and with Relay Couplers.
Datajack.Description: Active melee Datajacks can be used in an attempt to disarm or reprogram known traps by moving into them (10% chance).

Stasis Beam.Name: Stasis Beam
Stasis Beam.Effect: Holds target in place. Beam strength: 1. Also cancels a flying/hovering target's 10%/5% bonus to dodge for the duration.

Core Stripper.Name: Core Stripper
Core Stripper.Effect: Splits robots into constituent parts on 33% of successful hits.

Segregator.Name: Segregator
Segregator.Description: Overloads the highest-listed active power source to create a powerful directed charge that blasts up to four components clean off the target.

Tearclaws.Name: Tearclaws
Tearclaws.Description: 40% chance to rip component off target.

Master Tearclaws.Name: Master Tearclaws
Master Tearclaws.Description: 60% chance to rip component off target.

Sigix Broadsword.Name: Sigix Broadsword
Sigix Broadsword.Effect:
